# GNOME Shell Extension Project - obision-extension-grid

This is a GNOME Shell extension project with TypeScript support and modern development tooling.

## Project Structure
- `metadata.json` - Extension metadata and compatibility
- `extension.js` - Main extension code
- `prefs.js` - Preferences UI
- `stylesheet.css` - Extension styles
- `schemas/` - GSettings schemas for preferences

## Development
- TypeScript for type safety
- ESLint for code quality
- Build scripts for packaging

## Guidelines
- Follow GNOME Shell extension API patterns
- Use GJS (GNOME JavaScript) conventions
- Keep UI consistent with GNOME design
